Review Comment:
i bought a samsung tablet for portable illustration, but realized too late that it didnt come with flash for the camera. my current personal phones camera is smashed.
i basically bought this just to use as a camera.

the camera is very nice, autofocus works well, great dark visibility.
the Macro setting isnt very good, the normal camera takes a better focused closeup photo. you cannot force focus in the macro setting at all.

i also noticed there is no music player on the phone, ive noticed no modern phones ive bought have music players anymore, but my original 8 year old phone DID come with a music player.

i dont like the infinity dot front camera because it obscures full screen videos/photos, but you cant find any modern phone without it or with an unobscured framed screen anymore. again, my 8 year old phone DID have an unobscured screen (though its cracked now...).

decent for the price & im happy with the camera.
definitely comparable or better camera to an iphone or android.

Edit: well, twist of fate, this is now my main personal phone. My old j7 finally crapped out & turns out the tcl 10l I was saving to convert to my main- isn't actually fully compatible with metrobytmobile.
I tested this phone & I get 5g signal & perfect function.

A con I've found is that there isn't really much peripherals for this thing in the market. Like cases & screen protectors etc. I'd like to see some more options there.
